# Portfolio Website Project Instructions

## Project Overview
React TypeScript portfolio website for Evan McGarry, software developer
- Technology Stack: React, TypeScript, CSS Modules
- Deployment: GitHub Pages
- Purpose: Online resume/portfolio

## Development Guidelines

- Implement responsive design for all screen sizes
- Follow TypeScript best practices
- Optimize for GitHub Pages deployment
